abstract: By the Book interview with Neil Patrick Harris, whose book Choose Your Own Autobiography has been published.
lead_paragraph: The author of “Choose Your Own Autobiography” loved “Gone Girl”: “I devoured the acknowledgments, the book cover flaps, the ISBN, you name it. If it had been like a DVD, I could have read the ‘making of’ the writing of the book. I was that into it.”
